type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList

    );
    (fun () -> mkTest

                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

    );
    (fun () -> mkTest

                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&

    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest

    );

                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"

                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest

                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876

                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]

    (fun () -> mkTest

                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]

  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in

    (!score, !max)

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in

    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with

      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

    (fun () -> mkTest

    (fun () -> mkTest

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&

    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =

type test = unit -> string

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"
      (Printexc.to_string ex)

(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)
(*XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX*)

let sampleTests =
  [
    (fun () -> mkTest
                 sumList
                 [1;2;3;4]
                 10
                 "sample: sumList 1"
    );
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;-2;3;5] 
                 7 
                 "sample: sumList 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 sumList 
                 [1;3;5;7;9;11]
                 36 
                 "sample: sumList 3"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 3124 
                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt 
                 352663 
                 [3;5;2;6;6;3] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 31243
                 [3;1;2;4;3] 
                 "sample: digits 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digits
                 (-23422)
                 [2;3;4;2;2]
                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 additivePersistence 
                 9876 
                 2 
                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitalRoot 
                 9876 
                 3 
                 "sample: digitalRoot"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse
                 [1;2;3;4] 
                 [4;3;2;1]
                 "sample: reverse 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 listReverse 
                 ["a";"b";"c";"d"]
                 ["d";"c";"b";"a"] 
                 "sample: rev 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "malayalam" 
                 true
                 "sample: palindrome 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 palindrome 
                 "myxomatosis" 
                 false
                 "sample: palindrome 2"
    )] 

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in
  let _ = print130 ("Compiled\n") in
    (!score, !max)

let key        = ""     (*XXXXXXXX*)
let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

let mkTest f x y name = runTest ((f, x, y), 1, name)

let badTest () = "WARNING: Your tests are not valid!!\n"

let scoreMsg () = 
  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max 

let doTest f = 
  try f () with ex -> 
    Printf.sprintf "WARNING: INVALID TEST THROWS EXCEPTION!!: %s \n\n"

                 [3;1;2;4] 
                 "sample: digitsOfInt 1"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest 
                 digitsOfInt

                 "sample: digits 2"
    ); 
    (fun () -> mkTest

                 "sample: additivePersistence1"
    );

let _ =
  let report = List.map doTest (sampleTests) in
  let _ = List.iter print130 (report@([scoreMsg()])) in

  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in

      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in

    if i >= String.length s 
    then [] 
    else (s.[i]) :: (go (i+1)) 
  in
    go 0

let palindrome w = 
  if listReverse(explode w) = explode w 
  then true
  else false
;;

let prefix130  = "130"  (*XXXXXXXX*)

let print130 s = print_string (prefix130^">>"^s)

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0
let timeout = 300

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&  
    runWTimeout(testBad,0,1,5) = Fail &&  
    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" && 
    runWTimeout(testTimeout,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "timeout"

let runTest ((f,arg,out),points,name) =
  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

  Printf.sprintf "Results: Score/Max = %d / %d \n" !score !max

exception ErrorCode of string

exception TestException

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0
let max = ref 0

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) =

  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in

exception ErrorCode of string

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) = 
  try if compare (f arg) out = 0 then Pass else Fail
  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception") 

let testTest () =
  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in

    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&

  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception")

  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&

  let _   = max := !max + points in

      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"

type result = Pass | Fail | ErrorCode of string

let score = ref 0

let runWTimeout (f,arg,out,time) =

  with e -> (print130 ("Uncaught Exception: "^(Printexc.to_string e)); ErrorCode "exception")

  let testGood x = 1 in
  let testBad x = 0 in 
  let testException x = raise TestException in
  let rec testTimeout x = testTimeout x in
    runWTimeout(testGood,0,1,5) = Pass &&

    runWTimeout(testException,0,1,5) = ErrorCode "exception" &&

  let _   = max := !max + points in
  let outs = 
    match runWTimeout(f,arg,out,timeout) with 
        Pass -> (score := !score + points; "[pass]")
      | Fail -> "[fail]"
      | ErrorCode e -> "[error: "^e^"]"  in
    name^" "^outs^" ("^(string_of_int points)^")\n"
